T02TD3670E:282a-1: a'a rya t'a r'a de ba'i sto tra pushpa m'a li n'a ma /
T02TD3670E:282a-3: 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa me tog phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD3670E:282b-0: mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan @282b ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3670E:282b-1: thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la gzigs pa'i //
T02TD3670E:282b-2: zhabs kyi padma la ni btud de //
T02TD3670E:282b-3: tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir du //
T02TD3670E:282b-4: lhag pa'i lha la bstod par bya'o //
T02TD3670E:282b-5: phyag 'tshal sgrol ma lha ye lha khyod //
T02TD3670E:282b-6: dngos grub ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas //
T02TD3670E:282b-7: yid bzhin nor bu rin po che ltar //
T02TD3670E:282b-8: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar mdzad ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-9: phyag 'tshal ngo mtshar khyad du 'phags pa'i //
T02TD3670E:282b-10: yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i sku la //
T02TD3670E:282b-11: ye shes lnga yi rang mdangs rgyas pas //
T02TD3670E:282b-12: thugs rje'i 'od zor phyogs bcur 'phro ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-13: phyag 'tshal chu bzhi'i pha rol legs gnas //
T02TD3670E:282b-14: las dang nyon mongs srid las rnam grol //
T02TD3670E:282b-15: sangs rgyas yon tan phyir mi ldog pa'i //
T02TD3670E:282b-16: sa lam ma lus mtha' ru phyin ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-17: phyag 'tshal srid pa'i dra ba 'joms mdzad //
T02TD3670E:282b-18: thugs kyi sting po yi ge bcu pas //
T02TD3670E:282b-19: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyad //
T02TD3670E:282b-20: phrin las 'od kyis nam mkha' gang ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-21: phyag 'tshal 'gro ba'i skyabs mchog sgrol ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-22: bud med gzugs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad //
T02TD3670E:282b-23: dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug sras mo //
T02TD3670E:282b-24: 'phags pa'i spyan chab las ni 'khrungs ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-25: phyag 'tshal 'gran zla med pa'i sku mchog / zag med bde rgyas zla ba'i gdan la //
T02TD3670E:282b-26: bzhugs pa'i zhabs kyi padmo la ni //
T02TD3670E:282b-27: lha dang lha min cod pan gtugs ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-28: phyag 'tshal che ba'i nang na che mchog /'byung bo ro langs ma rungs tshogs 'joms //
T02TD3670E:282b-29: gzhan gyis mi thub drag rtsal chen mo //
T02TD3670E:282b-30: stobs chen pha rol gnon par mdzad ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-31: phyag tshal sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol mdzad //
T02TD3670E:282b-32: bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi zhabs la //
T02TD3670E:282b-33: skyabs pa'i mi de mya ngan 'das thob //
T02TD3670E:282b-34: mchog gi don chen 'grub par mdzad ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-35: phyag 'tshal seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-36: rigs drug bur 'dzin brtse ba'i thugs kyi //
T02TD3670E:282b-37: snying rje chen po'i gru gzings kyis ni //
T02TD3670E:282b-38: srid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol ma //
T02TD3670E:282b-39: phyag 'tshal phongs pa kun las skyob mdzad //
T02TD3670E:282b-40: 'tsho bas mnar te mchu mgul skams nas //
T02TD3670E:282b-41: bkras pas khyod la gsol ba btab pas //
T02TD3670E:282b-42: longs spyod mi zad char rgyan 'bebs ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-1: dpa' mo rdo rje sgrol ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-2: 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog can //
T02TD3670E:283a-3: rdo rje la sogs phyag mtshan brgyad kyis //
T02TD3670E:283a-4: phrin las rnams kyi 'gro don mdzad ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-5: phyag 'tshal skye 'gro rnams la dbang sgyur //
T02TD3670E:283a-6: 'jig rten gsum na mthu rtsal ldan pa'i //
T02TD3670E:283a-7: dregs pas myos pa rnams kyi cod pan //
T02TD3670E:283a-8: khyod kyi zhabs kyi mthil gyis brdzis ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-9: phyag 'tshal thub dbang stobs bcu'i rtsal ldan //
T02TD3670E:283a-10: sku lnga'i rang bzhin khyab bdag chen mo //
T02TD3670E:283a-11: bsrung med gsum dang ma 'dres dran gsum //
T02TD3670E:283a-12: yongs su dag pa bzhi pa mnga' ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-13: phyag 'tshal srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol //
T02TD3670E:283a-14: ye shes sku la rdzu 'phrul thogs med //
T02TD3670E:283a-15: thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes //
T02TD3670E:283a-16: sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i dri ma dag ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-17: phyag 'tshal mthu stobs bdag mo'i snying po //
T02TD3670E:283a-18: yi ge bcu pa spyi bor btags nas //
T02TD3670E:283a-19: dpong tshogs sde bzhi'i nang du phyin pas //
T02TD3670E:283a-20: pha rol dmag gi g-yul ngo bzlog ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-21: phyag 'tshal mkhyen dang brtse ba'i bdag nyid //
T02TD3670E:283a-22: bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam thar mang pos //
T02TD3670E:283a-23: brgyan pa'i gter mdzad dpal gyi be'ur //
T02TD3670E:283a-24: shes bya'i dkyil mtha' rtag tu chud ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-25: phyag 'tshal nyi ma 'bum gyi mdangs can //
T02TD3670E:283a-26: shes rab chen po'i 'od zer 'bar bas //
T02TD3670E:283a-27: khams gsum sems can rnams kyi rgyud la //
T02TD3670E:283a-28: ma reg sgo nga'i mun rum sel ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-29: phyag 'tshal ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid //
T02TD3670E:283a-30: dpal ldan dri ma med pa'i sku la //
T02TD3670E:283a-31: mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan //
T02TD3670E:283a-32: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-33: phyag 'tshal khams gsum dbang du sdud ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-34: tshangs pa khyab 'jug ma h'a de ba //
T02TD3670E:283a-35: lha chen rnams kyi dbu yi cod pan //
T02TD3670E:283a-36: khyod kyi zhabs la rab tu btud ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-37: phyag 'tshal 'jigs pa kun las skyob mdzad //
T02TD3670E:283a-38: me dang chu dang rgyal po'i chad pa //
T02TD3670E:283a-39: stag dang seng de sbrul dang srin po //
T02TD3670E:283a-40: glang po che yi bred dngangs sel ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-41: phyag 'tshal byin rlabs rmad du gyur ma ;
T02TD3670E:283a-42: /'byung ba 'khrugs dang gdon gyis bskyed pa'i //
T02TD3670E:283a-43: srog 'phrog nad kyi bye brag ma lus //
T02TD3670E:283a-44: khyod la gsol btab gdung ba sel ma //
T02TD3670E:283a-45: phyag 'tshal btsun mo rin chen cha byad //
T02TD3670E:283a-46: smin ma'i bar nas mdzod spu 'od 'bar //
T02TD3670E:283b-0: thugs rje chags pas @283b 'gro la gzigs ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-1: phyag 'tshal stong nyid snying rje'i lcags kyus //
T02TD3670E:283b-3: shul nor 'phrang la thugs rjes bzung na //
T02TD3670E:283b-4: thar pa'i lam la khrid par mdzad pa //
T02TD3670E:283b-5: phyag 'tshal bdud bzhi 'joms par mdzad ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-6: sangs rgyas kun dngos rje btsun ma khyod //
T02TD3670E:283b-7: phung po lnga spangs lnga yi bdag nyid //
T02TD3670E:283b-8: ye shes lnga rdzogs nyon mongs spangs ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-9: phyag 'tshal dge legs gzi brjid chen mo //
T02TD3670E:283b-10: zhal bzangs bcu drug zla ba rgyas 'dra'i //
T02TD3670E:283b-11: 'od kyis skye 'gro rnams kyi rgyud la //
T02TD3670E:283b-12: shes rab dpal dang blo gros spel ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-13: phyag 'tshal bud med sgyu 'phrul khyod la //
T02TD3670E:283b-14: m'a ma k'i dang spyan ma gos dkar //
T02TD3670E:283b-15: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis //
T02TD3670E:283b-16: che ba'i che mchog rnams kyis bstod ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-17: phyag 'tshal h'um gi sbyor ba dang ldan //
T02TD3670E:283b-18: gnas gsum du ni de nyid bkod pas //
T02TD3670E:283b-19: nus pa'i rdzu 'phrul mtha' la rgyas nas //
T02TD3670E:283b-20: phrin las bzhi yi rtsal dang ldan ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-21: phyag 'tshal dge ba rgyas par mdzad ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-22: ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar bas //
T02TD3670E:283b-23: mun pa rang sar dag pa bzhin du //
T02TD3670E:283b-24: khyod bsgoms sgrib pa spong bar byed ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-25: phyag 'tshal phrin las du ma'i bdag mo //
T02TD3670E:283b-26: khyod sku sna tshogs ngo bo shel bzhin //
T02TD3670E:283b-27: sku mdog phyag mtshan gcig tu ma nges ;
T02TD3670E:283b-28: / gang la nye bar tha dad 'char ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-29: phyag 'tshal don dam rgyal ba'i yum las //
T02TD3670E:283b-30: ma g-yos kun rdzob lha mo'i gzugs can //
T02TD3670E:283b-31: sku mdog sngo ljang gar gyi nyams dgus //
T02TD3670E:283b-32: bde gsal mi rtog pa yis 'gying ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-33: phyag 'tshal 'khor ba'i g-yul ngo bzlog ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-34: nga bdag dngos por zhen pa'i snying la //
T02TD3670E:283b-35: spros bral ye shes ral gri bsnun nas //
T02TD3670E:283b-36: gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i dpa' bo gsod ma //
T02TD3670E:283b-37: phyag 'tshal tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i dbu skra //
T02TD3670E:283b-38: mthon mthing lcang lo 'khyil pa'i dbus na //
T02TD3670E:283b-39: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med las //
T02TD3670E:283b-40: thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro mdzad //
T02TD3670E:283b-41: gang gis me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa //
T02TD3670E:283b-42: klog gam kha dog 'don par byed pa //
T02TD3670E:283b-43: de yis bsod nams dpag med 'thob cing //
T02TD3670E:283b-44: sdig sgrib stobs chen ma lus dag 'gyur //
T02TD3670E:283b-45: gang zhig skye bo tha mal rnams kyis //
T02TD3670E:284a-0: @284a * // gnag g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi //
T02TD3670E:284a-1: sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis rlobs 'gyur //
T02TD3670E:284a-2: su yis blo la bstod pa 'di 'dzin //
T02TD3670E:284a-3: 'dul khrims sdom pa dam tshig rnams kyi //
T02TD3670E:284a-4: nyes byas sbom pa rtsa ltung dri ma //
T02TD3670E:284a-5: ma lus dag nas dngos grub thob 'gyur //
T02TD3670E:284a-7: rgol ba ngan pa'i lung rigs tshar gcod //
T02TD3670E:284a-8: rig pa'i gnas la shes rab chen po //
T02TD3670E:284a-9: zla ba yar ngo bzhin du 'phel 'gyur //
T02TD3670E:284a-10: ae ma bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di ni /
T02TD3670E:284a-11: lan cig yid la dran pa tsam gyis //
T02TD3670E:284a-12: zhing mchog dag pa bde ba can der //
T02TD3670E:284a-13: the tshom med par nges par skye 'gyur //
T02TD3670E:284a-14: 'gro pa'i skyabs mchog rje btsun ma la //
T02TD3670E:284a-15: bdag gis me tog phreng bas bstod pa'i //
T02TD3670E:284a-16: dge ba gru gzings lta bu des ni //
T02TD3670E:284a-17: srid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol 'gyur //
T02TD3670E:284a-18: me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa 'di ni //
T02TD3670E:284a-19: rje btsun ma la lnga brgya pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i khur che ba'i yon tan du ma dang ldan pa //
T02TD3670E:284a-20: slob dpon tsandra go mi zhes bya bas bstod pa rdzogs so//
